thread.section_title: Wolcott Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient and very central
thread.title_full: Convenient and very central - Review of Wolcott Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: deborah291
title: Convenient and very central
text:
Hotel is dated but otherwise clean. Staff we dealt with were friendly and helpful. There's no free wifi which is very disappointing and is expected in this day and age.
We hadn't expected breakfast but were told at checkin that complimentary breakfast was included. We were delighted. Tea, coffee and assorted muffins every morning between 6 am and 9am. They were removed at exactly 9am.
